name: Grow (itch) (Asuro)
description:
I'll explain the idea here, because the whole game it's pretty confusing, what i was trying to do was a walking simulator about a 18 years old girl, she has to pick one of the rooms that are in front of her, each room represent what the girl choosed to be in that year, she can't go back to any room, because decisions can't be changed it.

The initial idea is that the game ends when she turns 25 years old, because from there, we can said that she realizes that what it's done it's done and she has to move forward.

All the assets are from the Unity asset store, thanks to every creator.

Finally, there are missing a lot of things that i wanted to do but no time so, if you like the concept feel free to use it! obviously is a concept ^^!.
